name: Love Vibe: Aria
description:
Wouldn't it be great to be in love with mesmerizing girl? Jump into this exciting experience and enjoy time with your girlfriend Aria, a stunning girl with beauty that makes men stop in their tracks.

Aria will hypnotize you with her charm. Relax and watch her dance for you! Get carried away and let your dreams come true!

Features:
- Admire your beloved girlfriend Aria and enjoy time with her like she is real person
- You can change her clothes
- Very natural movements achieved with motion capture technology
- You will notice that her skin is smooth and looks very realistic thanks to custom skin solution
